title: 296 - Stakeouts & Balloons
description: This week, Georgia and Karen cover the unsolved cases of three Indigenous women, Kiana Klomp, Amber Tuccaro, and Ella Mae Begay, and the disappearance of Lawrence Joseph Bader.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
